text.autoconfig.simple-mention.title: Simple Mention Configuration
text.autoconfig.simple-mention.option.en: Enable or disable the Simple Mention feature
text.autoconfig.simple-mention.option.pl: Play a sound when mentioned in chat
text.autoconfig.simple-mention.option.de: Show a desktop notification when mentioned in chat without focusing the game
text.autoconfig.simple-mention.option.on: When enabled, only mentioned players will see colored mentions. When disabled, all players see formatted mentions.
text.autoconfig.simple-mention.option.ig: When enabled, players won't receive notifications when they mention themselves
